TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeoCoordinateWatcher extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged, class System.Device.Location.IGeoPositionWatcher`1<class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>, class System.IDisposable
Public Class GeoCoordinateWatcher Implements IDisposable, IGeoPositionWatcher(Of GeoCoordinate), INotifyPropertyChanged
type GeoCoordinateWatcher = class interface IDisposable interface INotifyPropertyChanged interface IGeoPositionWatcher<GeoCoordinate>

summary.span: 提供以緯度與經度座標為根據的位置資料。

span.span: Supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供從目前的位置提供者的座標位置資料。The class supplies coordinate-based location data from the current location provider. 目前的位置提供者已設定優先順序最高的電腦上，根據許多因素，例如的年齡和精確度的所有提供者的資料位置的應用程式所要求的精確度以及功率耗用量和效能的影響位置提供者相關聯。The current location provider is prioritized as the highest on the computer, based on a number of factors, such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by location applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider. 目前的位置提供者可能會隨著時間改變，比方說，當 GPS 裝置失去其衛星訊號室內，Wi-fi 三角定位提供者會成為最精確的提供者電腦上。The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer. 若要開始存取位置資料，建立並呼叫或起始從目前的位置提供者的資料擷取。To begin accessing location data, create a and call or to initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider. 屬性可以檢查以判斷資料是否可用。The property can be checked to determine if data is available. 如果資料可供使用，您可以取得位置一次從屬性，或接收所處理的連續位置更新事件。If data is available, you can get the location one time from the property, or receive continuous location updates by handling the event. ， ，並屬性支援，好讓應用程式可以進行資料繫結至這些屬性。The , , and properties support , so that an application can data-bind to these properties. 在 Windows 7 中，所有類別都是完全正常地運作位置提供者已安裝且無法解析電腦的位置。In Windows 7, all the classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and able to resolve the computer's location. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 7 Starter Edition，唯一支援的位置提供者是預設位置提供者在控制台中，增益集必須安裝指定緯度和經度。On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the only supported location provider is the Default Location Provider in Control Panel, and an add-in must be installed to specify latitude and longitude. **請注意**在 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，適用下列情況：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 所有可以建立具有建構函式的物件，但屬性一律會有值。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 指定的位置的屬性一定會。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 任何位置將會引發事件。No location events will be raised. ## Examples 下列程式示範如何建立並開始使用初始化逾時取得的資料。The following program shows how to create a and start acquiring data by using an initialization timeout. 如果已知，程式碼接著會列印位置，的座標。The code then prints the coordinates of the location, if known. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataSync1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdatasync1/cs/getlocationdatasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataSync1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdatasync1/vb/GetLocationDataSync.vb#1)] 下列程式示範如何藉由訂閱接收連續位置更新事件。The following program shows how to receive continuous location updates by subscribing to events. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataasync/cs/getlocationdataasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataasync/vb/GetLocationDataAsync.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double MovementThreshold { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.MovementThreshold : double with get, set

summary.span: 必須在位置提供者引發另一個 事件之前，相對於上一個 事件的座標移動的距離 (以公尺為單位)。

span.span: The distance that must be moved, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last event, before the location provider raises another event.
Distance, in meters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的移動臨界值為零，這表示任何在目前的位置提供者會導致偵測到的位置中變更事件，以及在更新屬性。The default movement threshold is zero, which means that any change in location detected by the current location provider causes a event and an update in the property. > [!NOTE] > 移動臨界值並不保證事件將會收到要求的閾值。The movement threshold does not guarantee that events will be received at the requested threshold. 平台嘗試接受要求的特定移動臨界值，但在某些情況下，事件就不會引發在要求的臨界值。The platform attempts to honor requests for a particular movement threshold, but in some cases, the events will not be raised at the requested threshold. **請注意**在 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，適用下列情況：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 所有可以建立具有建構函式的物件，但屬性一律會有值。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 指定的位置的屬性一定會。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 任何位置將會引發事件。No location events will be raised. 下圖表示位置提供者 （例如 GPS 裝置） 提供給電腦的位置座標。The following diagram represents location coordinates that the location provider (for example, a GPS device) supplies to the computer. P1，在此圖中，代表包含在位置資料事件，和 P2、 P3 和 P4 代表移動臨界值內的點。P1, in the diagram, represents the location data included in a event, and P2, P3, and P4 represent points within the movement threshold. 因此，當位置提供者提供的資料不表示在這些時間點 （P1、 P2、 P3 和 P4） 的位置引發事件和傳回 P1。So when the location provider supplies data indicating a location at those points (P1, P2, P3, and P4), no events are raised, and returns P1. 是外部的點加入佇列的 P5距離，因此在該點，更新和就會引發事件。The point P5 is outside of the distance, so at that point, is updated and a event is raised. ![圖表說明 MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "圖表說明 MovementThreshold")![Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 距離移動，因為最後一個事件超過所指定的臨界值時，才會引發這個事件。This event is only raised when the distance moved since the last event exceeds the threshold that is specified by . 傳遞至事件處理常式物件包含包含更新的位置資料的物件。The object passed to the event handler includes the object that contains the updated location data. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何處理第一個事件。The following example shows how to handle the first event. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.LocationEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.locationevent1/cs/locationevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.LocationEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.locationevent1/vb/locationevent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 起始從目前位置提供者取得資料的作業。

span.span: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.

summary.span: 這個方法會啟用 事件並且允許存取 屬性。

span.span: This method enables events and allows access to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會起始從目前的位置提供者的資料擷取。Calling this method will initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider. 目前的位置提供者被根據一些因素，例如的年齡和所有的提供者、 應用程式或應用程式和功率耗用量所要求的精確度和位置提供者相關聯的效能影響資料的正確性.The current location provider is selected based on factors such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by the application or applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider. 目前的位置提供者可能會隨著時間改變，比方說，當 GPS 裝置失去其衛星訊號室內，Wi-fi 三角定位提供者會成為最精確的提供者電腦上。The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer. 如果目前位置提供者沒有資料時呼叫方法，就會開始取得資料。If the current prioritized location provider does not have data when the method is called, it will start to acquire data. 如果資料可用時，用戶端被授與權限，資料可以以同步方式，存取，而且如果已處理事件，會以非同步方式傳遞。If the permissions have been granted to the client when the data becomes available, data can be accessed synchronously, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled. 如果已停用的 Windows 7 感應器和位置平台時呼叫時，會立即傳回不會引發事件，以及所傳回位置屬性會包含.If the Windows 7 Sensor and Location platform is disabled when is called, will immediately return, events will not be raised, and the location returned by the property of will contain . 如果目前的已排定優先順序的位置提供者沒有資料，它將會以同步方式就立即可用，並處理事件，如果以非同步方式傳遞。If the current prioritized location provider does have data, it will be available synchronously immediately, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled. 如果呼叫的應用程式並沒有從位置提供者存取資料的權限，將會提示使用者，以授與或拒絕權限的對話方塊。If the calling application does not have permissions to access data from a location provider, the user will be prompted with a dialog box to either grant or deny permission. 對話方塊將會非強制回應。The dialog box will be modeless. ## Examples 下列程式會處理之後，就會發生的第一個位置更新呼叫。The following program handles the first location update that occurs after is called. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataUpdateOnce#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataupdateonce/cs/getlocationdataupdateonce.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataUpdateOnce#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataupdateonce/vb/GetLocationDataUpdateOnce.vb#1)]
